definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: An evil Opus Dei albino monk stalks the streets of Rome in the film, The Da Vinci Code.
sentences.chinese: 电影《达芬奇密码》中有一名患有白化病的邪恶巫师。

sentences.english: People with albinism have little or no pigment in the eyes, skin and hair.
sentences.chinese: 白化病的人很少或没有色素的眼睛，皮肤和头发。

sentences.english: Mike the albino with the crewcut can be the general contractor.
sentences.chinese: 平头的白化病者可以成为总承包商。
我母亲是半个白化病人。

sentences.english: This humpback mother whale still loves her freaky albino baby.
sentences.chinese: 驼背鲸妈妈仍然爱着她的白化病宝宝。

sentences.english: Mother and child albino kangaroos in Canberra, Australia.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚堪培拉的白化病袋鼠母子。

sentences.english: This humpback mother whale still loves her freaky albino baby.
sentences.chinese: 驼背鲸妈妈仍然爱著她的白化病宝宝。
比我这个白化病人还要白。

sentences.english: An albino tiger in the India's Delhi Zoo.
sentences.chinese: 印度德里动物园的一只白化病病虎。

sentences.english: Albino animals seem to be everywhere these days.
sentences.chinese: 现在，患白化病动物似乎无处不在。

sentences.english: Albinism occurs in individuals who produce no melanin.
sentences.chinese: 白化病是由于人的皮肤中不产生黑素而造成的。

sentences.english: Eventually he abducts an albino to help him find the gold.
sentences.chinese: 最终他诱使一个白化病者帮他寻找黄金。

definition: to contract (an illness)/to be afflicted with/to suffer from
